nodes.text: The Apalis Fields was a series of farm fields along the Apalis Coast, just north of the Seaside Windfarms. The fields were west of the Organa Vinerium, which used the harvest from the Apalis Fields to produce wine for House Organa. During the Alderaan Civil War, House Thul and Imperial forces under Grand Marshal Herkuun and Baron Jharkus Thul invaded the Vinerium and the Apalis Fields.
